title: OnePlus Concept One hands-on: disappearing camera
description: OnePlus has created a concept phone in collaboration with McLaren that has a special electrochromic glass panel on the back. It makes the cameras disappear under an opaque pane of glass, then when you open the camera app they appear. It also works as an ND filter.
